content: Hey Jake, I enjoy your posts, and that’s awesome that you’ve committed yourself to write everyday. Thank you! I know that you’re writing for your own development, but could I just recommend one thing in your posts? It’s not even about your writing. I think your posts could use some stock images at the top to go with it. You can find many sites to get these stock images that may or may not associate with your post — but they definitely make them look better. I use unsplash.com I only suggest this because it would make your posts look better.
